div1.p: White believes that he and Carter are the only scientists with a full understanding of how to eliminate yellow fever, although Scannell and Beeuwkes may learn.

June 30/25
My dear old Friend:
div1.p:
I am deeply touched by
your little note on the bottom of Laura's
beautifully gracious letter to my wife

I am more sorry than I can tell
you to know that you are in such
case.

It is just the plain truth to tell
you that the work needs you and it
is not ego to say me also, because
aside from you & me no one not even
Guiteras grasps the big main ideas
involved in the elimination of Y. F.
as laid down in your article on autimotic
elimination

Scannell is nearer to it than any
one else - Beeuwkes may learn - all
the rest are hopelessly fuddled in their
ideas on the Epidemiology of Y. F. and
its peculiar variants under endemic
conditions.

As a part of your well
proven great love of humanity, you
must spare yourself- Take care of
yourself- Not “die that others may
live” but live that others many
others, may have a better chance to live
and until we can teach Scannell &
Beeuwkes in whole (hardly possible)
or in part, to take up our burden,

May God be with you till we
meet again

closer.seg:
P.S.
Am holding the big center
absolutely - hence the small
flares dont disturb me much
Tho' they delay the end.
